name: spatial surge
description: Shoot a beam at your foe. The farther away they are, the more damage you deal.
short_description: Shoot a beam at your foe. The farther away they are, the more damage you deal.

name: mirror blade
description: Throw an illusionary sword that bounces between targets, damaging foes and giving might to allies. It creates a clone at its first target.
short_description: Throw a sword, damage multiple foes and create a clone.

name: mind stab
description: Thrust your sword into the ground, damaging foes and removing 1 boon.
short_description: Thrust your sword into the ground, damaging foes and removing 1 boon.

name: Phantasmal Berserker
description: Throw an illusionary sword that inflicts vulnerability in a line and then returns to you. Create a phantasm that uses a whirling attack to damage and cripple foes.
short_description: Throw your sword, inflict vulnerability, and summon a phantasm.

name: Illusionary Wave
description: Push back all foes in front of you with a wave of magical energy.
short_description: Push back all foes in front of you with a wave of magical energy.

name: winds of chaos
description: Bounce an orb of energy between foes and allies that applies random boons to allies and random conditions to foes.
short_description: Bounce an orb of energy between foes and allies that applies random boons to allies and random conditions to foes.

name: phase retreat
description: Teleport away from your target, summoning a clone that casts Winds of Chaos.
short_description: Teleport away from your target, summoning a clone that casts Winds of Chaos.

name: Phantasmal Warlock
description: Summon two illusions that deal damage and inflict vulnerability.
short_description: Summon two illusions that deal damage and inflict vulnerability.

name: chaos armour
description: Apply a random condition to nearby foes and gain chaos armor. Chaos armor gives you random boons and your foe random conditions whenever you are struck.
short_description: Apply a random condition to nearby foes and gain chaos armor. Chaos armor gives you random boons and your foe random conditions whenever you are struck.

name: chaos storm
description: Create a magical storm at the target location that applies random conditions to foes and boons to allies.
short_description: Create a magical storm at the target location that applies random conditions to foes and boons to allies.

name: Temporal Curtain
description: Create a wall of energy that grants swiftness to allies who cross it and cripples foes who touch it.
short_description: Create a wall of energy that grants swiftness to allies who cross it and cripples foes who touch it.

name: into the void
description: Shatter your Temporal Curtain, pulling nearby enemies toward its position.
short_description: Shatter your Temporal Curtain, pulling nearby enemies toward its position.

name: Deja Vu
description: Disappear in a cloud of smoke, blinding nearby foes and losing conditions.
short_description: Disappear in a cloud of smoke, blinding nearby foes and losing conditions.

name: echo of memory
description: Block incoming attacks for a short duration. If this skill fully channels, summon a phantasm that slows enemies and grants protection to allies
short_description: Block incoming attacks for a short duration. If this skill fully channels, summon a phantasm that slows enemies and grants protection to allies

name: Tides of Time
description: Launch a wave of temporal energy that damages and stops enemies it passes through and buffs allies.
short_description: Launch a wave of temporal energy that damages and stops enemies it passes through and buffs allies.

name: Well of Eternity
description: Create a well that rewinds time, removing conditions from allies. When it expires, the well heals all allies in the area.
short_description: Create a well that rewinds time, removing conditions from allies. When it expires, the well heals all allies in the area.

name: Well of Action
description: Create a well of delayed time, damaging and slowing foes. When the well expires, time snaps back, granting quickness to allies
short_description: Recover health over time.

name: Well of Calamity
description: Create a well that rends time,damaging,weakening, and crippling foes in the area. When the final pulse of Well of Calamity triggers, it deals massive damage to foes in the area.
short_description: Create a well that rends time,damaging,weakening, and crippling foes in the area

name: Well of Precognition
description: Create a well that gives allies the ability to see the future, allowing them to block incoming attacks. When the well ends, allies within the well regain endurance.
short_description: Create a well that gives allies the ability to see the future, allowing them to block incoming attacks. When the well ends, allies within the well regain endurance.

name: Gravity Well
description: Create a powerful well that warps space in an area, knocking down, floating, and pulling foes caught in its event horizon.
short_description: Create a powerful well that warps space in an area, knocking down, floating, and pulling foes caught in its event horizon.

name: Well of Recall
description: Creates a well that steals memories from foes, damaging and chilling them
short_description: Creates a well that steals memories from foes, damaging and chilling them

name: Blink of an Eye
description: Gain stealth and summon an illusion to attack your foe.
short_description: Gain stealth and summon an illusion to attack your foe.

name: Feedback
description: Create a dome around your foes that reflects projectiles.
short_description: Create a dome around your foes that reflects projectiles.

name: Power Spike
description: Damage your target and nearby foes. Inflict vulnerability on foes whose skills aren't active.
short_description: Damage your target and nearby foes. Inflict vulnerability on foes whose skills aren't active.

name: Power Cleanse
description: Remove conditions from you and nearby allies.
short_description: Remove conditions from you and nearby allies.

name: Blink
description: Teleport to a target location.
short_description: Teleport to a target location.
